      • play

        public void play(int track,
                 boolean loop)
          throws javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        Plays audio track
        Parameters:
        track - specifies track number from Sritng url array
        loop - specifies if track must loop itself
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - line is unabailble
        java.io.IOException - ioexception
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - unsuported audio file

        Parameters:
        level - specifies track from String track array which is associated with level number.
